creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: bowl with small foot; underglaze blue design of blossoming chrysanthemums with thin sprigs of grasses on one side; blossoming fujibakama and thin grasses on opposite; cover has small knob on top that becomes foot of a small rice bowl when placed upside down; cover also has a cluster of chrysanthemums and fujibakama on lid; thin blue lines around lips and feet
title: Covered jar with design of chrysanthemum & fujibakama plant
